TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageQueryCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQuery>

Docs.summary: A collection of message query objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks See the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageQueryCollection> class for a concrete implementation.
## Examples The following example creates a message and XPath message queries. The queries are evaluated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery> objects contained in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageQueryCollection> object. The results of each query are tested using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathResult.ResultType%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathResult> class.
[!code-vb[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.di_4_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.di_4_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQuery, !!TResult>> Evaluate<TResult>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: The type of the result of the query.
Docs.param: The message to run the query against.
Docs.summary: Runs a query against the message and returns a result. The body cannot be queried.
Docs.returns: The result of the query. The type is determined by the generic argument.

Docs.summary: Runs a query against the message and returns a result.
